title: Bug 4974 - Set classpath / output location should be one operation
OB: When the user presses 'Ok' after setting the output location, an error message is displayed: 'Cannot nest output folder /xy in source folder /xy/src'. This error occurs because setting the output location and classpath are currently separate operations. By setting the output location first, an illegal state is created.
SR:
1. Open the project settings.
2. Navigate to the 'Build Path' or 'Output' section.
3. Set the output location.
4. Set the classpath.
5. Press 'Ok' to save the changes.
